mapper.select: SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1, A.* FROM ( SELECT CLT_NAME, ORD_SHP_CAT, ORD_SHP_WAY, ORD_ORD_WAY, RLS_CODE, ORD_SHP_DEST, ORD_NO, OI_NO, OI_QTY, V_NAME, ITM_NAME, ITM_CODE, PIC_QTY, RI_QTY, EMP_NAME, RI_RLS_PRT_DT, RLS_BX_QTY, RLS_DN, RI_RCPT_PRT_DT, RI_NT FROM rls_insp_view) A, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R ORDER BY CLT_NAME DESC

select @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 as no, `I`.`ITM_CODE`, `I`.`ITM_NAME`, OI.OI_QTY, IFNULL(P.PIC_QTY, CSP.CSP_RCV_QTY) as pic_qty, `RI`.`RI_QTY`, B.BX_NUM, B.BX_ITM_QTY, B.RLS_CODE, B.OI_NO from (SELECT * FROM TB_ORD WHERE ORD_STS IN (4,5,6)) AS O INNER JOIN (SELECT @ROWNUM :=0 , TB_ORD_ITM.* FROM TB_ORD_ITM) AS OI ON `O`.`ORD_NO` = `OI`.`ORD_NO` INNER JOIN TB_ITM AS I ON `OI`.`ITM_CODE` = `I`.`ITM_CODE` INNER JOIN TB_RLS_INSP AS RI ON `RI`.`OI_NO` = `OI`.`OI_NO` LEFT JOIN TB_PIC AS P ON `OI`.`OI_NO` = P.OI_NO LEFT JOIN TB_CMB_SHP_PTN AS CSP ON `OI`.`OI_NO` = CSP.OI_NO INNER JOIN TB_BX AS B ON `OI`.`OI_NO` = B.OI_NO WHERE O.ORD_NO = #{orderNo} and B.BX_NUM = #{index}

select * from ( SELECT if(a.rls_code like a.rls_prev, @rownum:=@rownum+0, @rownum:=@rownum+1) as 'no' , A.* FROM ( SELECT CLT_NAME, ORD_SHP_CAT, ORD_SHP_WAY, ORD_ORD_WAY, RLS_CODE, OI_QTY, lag(RLS_CODE) over(order by clt_name) as rls_prev, ORD_SHP_DEST, ORD_NO, OI_NO, V_NAME, ITM_NAME, ITM_CODE, PIC_QTY, RI_QTY, EMP_NAME, RI_RLS_PRT_DT, RLS_BX_QTY, RLS_DN, RI_RCPT_PRT_DT, RI_NT, RI_URLS FROM rls_insp_view ORDER BY CLT_NAME DESC) A, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R ORDER BY CLT_NAME DESC ) as C where C.rls_code = #{releaseCode};

select `C`.`CLT_NAME` ,`O`.`ORD_SHP_CAT`,`R`.`RLS_CODE`,`O`.`ORD_NO`, IFNULL(P.PIC_QTY, CSP.CSP_RCV_QTY) as pic_qty, `RI`.`RI_QTY`, `R`.`RLS_BX_QTY`, oi.oi_urls_qty, oi.oi_qty, `I`.`ITM_CODE`, `I`.`ITM_NAME`, OI.OI_NO, O.ORD_STS, R.RLS_BX_QTY from (SELECT * FROM TB_ORD WHERE ORD_STS IN (4,5,6)) AS O INNER JOIN TB_ORD_ITM AS OI ON `O`.`ORD_NO` = `OI`.`ORD_NO` INNER JOIN TB_RLS AS R ON `O`.`ORD_NO` = `R`.`ORD_NO` INNER JOIN TB_CLT AS C ON `O`.`CLT_NO` = `C`.`CLT_NO` INNER JOIN TB_ITM AS I ON `OI`.`ITM_CODE` = `I`.`ITM_CODE` INNER JOIN TB_RLS_INSP AS RI ON `RI`.`OI_NO` = `OI`.`OI_NO` LEFT JOIN TB_PIC AS P ON `OI`.`OI_NO` = P.OI_NO LEFT JOIN TB_CMB_SHP_PTN AS CSP ON `OI`.`OI_NO` = CSP.OI_NO WHERE R.RLS_CODE = #{code}
WHERE R.RLS_CODE = (SELECT TB_RLS.RLS_CODE FROM TB_ORD_ITM, TB_BRCD, TB_ORD, TB_RLS WHERE TB_ORD_ITM.OI_NO = TB_BRCD.OI_NO AND TB_ORD.ORD_NO = TB_ORD_ITM.ORD_NO AND TB_ORD.ORD_NO = TB_RLS.ORD_NO AND TB_BRCD.BRCD_NO = #{code})
